title: Ashneer Grover has no individual role in Unity SFB, says Centrum's Jaspal Bindra - Economic Times
content: Ashneer Grover has no individual role in Unity SFB, says Centrum's Jaspal Bindra  Economic Times
description: Unity Small Finance Bank has taken over Punjab and Maharashtra Co-Operative Bank (PMC) in a revival programme for the scandal-hit lender.
